TopicTitle: Kelta-7 Aethersprite (Semi-Replica of the Star Wars Craft)

Articles.Content:
[imgur]CsGAc[/imgur]
This fighter is fast and light, with a high thrust to weight ratio and twin missiles. It is modeled after the fighter from star wars episode 2(does not come with r2 drone), the Delta-7 Aethersprite shown here:
[IMG]http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/79/Jedi_Starfighter_EpII.png/revision/latest?cb=20150722030412[/IMG]
The Kelta-7 is at the top. Download link:[URL]http://www./download/tv4qcmn9zd7vtw4/Kelta-7_Aethersprite.craft[/URL]
